data.eml:eml: Two new species of Heterophrynus Pocock, 1894 from Colombia with distribution notes and a new synonymy (Arachnida: Amblypygi: Phrynidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Giupponi, Alessandro P. L., Kury, Adriano B. (2013): Two new species of Heterophrynus Pocock, 1894 from Colombia with distribution notes and a new synonymy (Arachnida: Amblypygi: Phrynidae). Zootaxa 3647 (2): 329-342, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3647.2.5
